layout/empty:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <title>{{ head.title }}</title>
    {{{ head.meta_tags }}}
    {{{ head.config }}}

    <link href="{{ head.favicon }}" rel="shortcut icon">
    <meta name="google-site-verification" content="en_9BaePmnjiC1wa94L6I1Zq69WDierJ1_ZmbqCqnbk" />
    {{#block "head"}}{{/block}}
        <!-- Global site tag (gtag.js) - Google Analytics -->
        <script async src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=UA-180255211-1"></script>
        <script>
          window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
          function gtag(){dataLayer.push(arguments);}
          gtag('js', new Date());
        
          gtag('config', 'UA-180255211-1');
        </script>
    
    
</head>
<body{{#if theme_settings.enable_gradients}} class="gradient"{{/if}}>
    {{#block "page"}}{{/block}}
</body>
<style>
     h2.checkoutHeader-heading {
    background: url("https://cdn11.bigcommerce.com/s-z2qdisybty/product_images/uploaded_images/vector-smart-object1.png?t=1582162975&_ga=2.40243946.977186237.1582159027-2022119561.1571639426");
    text-align: center;
    background-color: #132448;
}
a.checkoutHeader-link > #logoImage {
    width: 200px;
    padding: 1% 0;
}
.checkoutHeader-content {
    margin: 0;
    max-width: 100%;
    padding: 0;
}
.optimizedCheckout-checkoutStep {
    border: none;
}
a.stepHeader.is-readonly {
    background: #174567;
    padding: 1% 0;
}
.stepHeader-figure.stepHeader-column {
    background-color: #174567;
    width: 100%;
}
.optimizedCheckout-step {
    background-color: transparent;
    color: #fff;
}
 .optimizedCheckout-step svg {
    fill: #ffffff;
}
.optimizedCheckout-step::before, a:focus, a:hover {
    color: #Ffffff;
}
.optimizedCheckout-headingPrimary {
    color: #fffFFF;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    font-weight: 600;
}
button#checkout-customer-continue {
    background: #ff2a00;
}
.checkout-view-header {
    margin-bottom: 3%;
}
button#checkout-shipping-continue {
    background: #ff2a00;
}

section.cart-section.optimizedCheckout-orderSummary-cartSection:last-child .optimizedCheckout-contentPrimary {
    color: #fff;
    font-weight: 400;
}
section.cart-section.optimizedCheckout-orderSummary-cartSection:last-child {
    background: #00d2ff;
}
article.cart.optimizedCheckout-orderSummary {
    color: #666666;
}
h5.product-title.optimizedCheckout-contentPrimary {
    color: #666666;
}
a.redeemable-label {
    color: #666666;
    font-weight: 600;
    text-decoration: none;
}
.optimizedCheckout-headingSecondary {
    color: #132448;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 18px;
    font-family: "Open Sans",Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;
}
a#cart-edit-link {
    color: #132448;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 18px;
}
.optimizedCheckout-contentPrimary {
    color: #666666;
    font-weight: 600;
}
article.cart.optimizedCheckout-orderSummary > .cart-header {
    background: #eeeeee;
}
</style>
</html>
